@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:20, topic:488646”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=606879.msg4258397#msg4258397 date=1363151413]
This whole guide (along with your NIO tutorial) is not explained (besides ISAACSIPHER), thus making this a snippet. Add some explanations please.
[/quote]

Sorry I’m not much of a Tutorial noob :P, I’ll try add some more indebth information which goes at an angle that won’t confuse the living shttt out of some people

Edit: I’ll re-do it giving full detail[/quote]
Good! I kind of said it because I wanted to know what I was adding. I felt like a perched whilst doing this.
